testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to delete Refund&Reason information with the specified ID number
testcase.name: The deletion of the desired Refund&Reason record via the API should be validated from the API.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/refundReasonDetails" path parameters...............passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the Deleted id to send to the api refundReasonDetails endpoint..passed * The api user saves the response returned from the api refundReasonDetails endpoint and confirms that the status code is '404' and the reason phrase is Not Found..passed
